description: Instructs Amazon Connect to resume the authentication process. The subsequent actions depend on the request body contents:

parameters.name: State
parameters.description: The state query parameter that was provided by Cognito in the redirectUri. This will also match the state parameter provided in the AuthenticationUrl from the GetAuthenticationUrl response.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.
